events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking hasn't updated in days, and I am concerned about the delay.
The customer's message includes keywords indicating a delivery delay, such as 'tracking' and 'delay'. Assigning to Delivery Delay cluster.
An agent has been assigned to handle the customer's delivery delay inquiry to provide timely support.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m sorry to hear your order hasn’t arrived yet. I’m here to help you resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address used so I can check the status with our logistics team?
Sure, my order number is ORD123456789 and the shipping address is 456 Elm Street, Springfield, IL, 62704.

Thank you for the details. I have contacted the courier and they confirmed your package was delayed due to weather issues. We expect delivery within 3 days. We can also offer a shipping refund for the inconvenience.
I appreciate you checking on this and offering a refund. I’ll wait for the delivery in the next few days. Thanks for your help!
Glad we could assist. Your refund for shipping will be processed shortly, and your package should arrive soon.
Following up to make sure your order has arrived and everything is satisfactory. Let us know if you need further assistance.
We are closing this case now. Feel free to reach out to us anytime for future support. Have a great day!
